about_the_game:
A sweet and tense battle in Tokyo!

Help them overcome their trauma with a deck that reflects your own play style!
Will you succeed in overcoming all their traumas and become Tokyo's favorite guy?

Infinite options for enemy attacks

When defending, you can choose High, Medium, or Low to prepare a counterattack against enemy attacks.
A successful counterattack will trigger special effects such as damage reflection and damage negation.
However, if you don't know the direction of an enemy's attack, you also have options to defend yourself.

Thrilling!

The game features colorful artwork and fighting animations not seen in traditional deck-building roguelikes.
Utilizing a variety of combinations, you can experience the upbeat, colorful action and powerful strikes that only fighting games can offer.
and powerful strikes that only fighting games can deliver.

Open World

Roam the city and discover beautiful girls you want to capture and steal their hearts.
Or just explore the city and see what it has to offer.

Sweet dates with beautiful girls


There are a total of 6 cute and adorable beautiful girls.
At first, these beautiful girls will be awkward and blunt towards the protagonist of a different nationality.
But what will they do once you win their hearts?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Adventure in Tokyo with your own deck combination and a variety of beautiful girls! The combo system lets you link cards to trigger combos, and the counter system lets you block and counter your opponent's attacks. Will you be able to win the hearts of all the beautiful girls?
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
